content:
There are no Russian warships in the Black Sea as of Wednesday, March 6.

About thisreportedNavy of the Armed Forces of Ukraine.

There is one enemy ship in the Azov Sea.

In the Mediterranean, there are 3 enemy ships, including one carpet carrier "Caliber", a total volley of up to 4 rockets.

In the interests of the Russian Federation during the last day, 16 vessels went to the Kerch Strait, of which 4 moved from the Bosphorus Strait.

19 vessels were passed to the Black Sea, 3 of them continued traffic in the direction of the Bosphorus Strait.

"The Russian Federation continues to violate the International Convention on the Protection of Human Life at the Sea of 1974 (SOLAS), switching off automatic identification systems (AIS)," the Navy of the Armed Forces emphasized.

As reported by the Armyinform, GURPosted a videoDestruction in the temporarily occupied Crimea of the Russian patrol ship "Sergey Kotov".
title: There are no Russian ships in the Black Sea after the destruction of "Sergey Kotov"
description: This was reported by the Navy of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. In the Azov Sea on the combat ...
author: Army Inform
